settings.text: What is OEKO-TEX Standard 100?

The OEKO-TEX Standard 100 certification is a globally recognized label ensuring that textiles are tested for harmful substances. Our Lany Space rugs meet this rigorous standard, guaranteeing that they are safe for you and your loved ones, including children and pets.
The Benefits of OEKO-TEX Certified Rugs

With OEKO-TEX certification, you can trust that our rugs are free from toxic chemicals and allergens. This standard not only supports environmental health but also prioritizes the well-being of our customers by ensuring high-quality, responsibly manufactured textiles.

settings.button_text: Learn More About OEKO-TEX Standard 100 on YouTube

settings.text: What Makes a Rug Sustainable?

Sustainable rugs are produced using eco-friendly materials and processes that minimize harm to the planet. At Lany Space, we emphasize sustainable practices at every stage of production, from responsibly sourcing materials to energy-efficient manufacturing, all while maintaining exceptional quality.
How Lany Space Ensures Sustainability in Every Step?
Our partnerships with certified factories and our commitment to environmentally conscious production allow us to offer rugs that are not only beautiful but also support a sustainable future.

settings.text: What Types of Artistic Rugs Are Suitable for Different Rooms?
When choosing artistic rugs for different rooms, weâve gathered insights to help select the right styles based on function and desired aesthetic.

settings.html_content:
-- Living Room

    Type: Large, statement rugs with bold patterns or colors.
    Why: The living room is the heart of the home, and a bold rug ties the space together. Choose abstract patterns or vibrant colors to express your style and personality.

+ Bedroom

    Type: Soft, plush rugs or layered rugs.
    Why: A bedroom calls for comfort, so choose rugs that feel good underfoot. A large area rug can define the space and create a cozy atmosphere, while smaller, artistic accent rugs can complement bedding and decor.

+ Nursery or Kids' Room

    Type: Stylish, low-pile non-slip rugs with vibrant designs.
    Why: These rugs provide safety for active play while offering calming patterns and bright colors that stimulate creativity, creating a cozy and playful environment for children.

+ Kitchen

    Type: Washable runners with fun designs.
    Why: Kitchens benefit from rugs that are easy to clean and can withstand spills. Runners are ideal for narrow spaces and can add a pop of color or whimsy. Look for artistic rugs with vibrant patterns that bring life to the kitchen while being practical for everyday use.

+ Dinning Room

    Type: Medium to large rugs featuring intricate patterns or warm colors.
    Why: The dining room is a gathering place, and an artistic rug can elevate the ambiance and make meals more inviting. Look for rugs with floral motifs, geometric designs, or rich, deep colors that complement your dining furniture. These choices add warmth and style, creating a welcoming atmosphere for family and friends.

+ Home Office & Studio

    Type: Stylish, low-pile rugs or area rugs with calming patterns.
    Why: A rug in a home office creates a focused work environment. Opt for artistic rugs featuring subtle geometric designs or calming color palettes that inspire creativity while maintaining a professional look. Rugs with soft textures and muted colors can enhance comfort and productivity, making them perfect for a stylish and functional workspace.

+ Hallway or Entryway

    Type: Runner rugs with unique patterns or textures.
    Why: A runner rug can enhance long, narrow spaces. Choose designs that invite guests in and reflect your style, while ensuring they are durable enough to handle foot traffic.

settings.text: What Shapes of Artistic Rugs Do We Offer?
With proper care, Lany Space rugs maintain their quality for 3-5 years of regular use. Our rugs are tested to withstand:

settings.html_content:
Traditional Shapes:
  • Rectangular
  • Oval
    • Irregular Shapes:
  • Animal-shaped rugs, such as dogs, tigers, leopards, snakes, and cats
  • Floral and plant designs, including grass, daisies, petals, and leaves
  • Modern Abstract Patterns: Rugs with wavy cuts, scalloped edges, and petal-inspired designs.

settings.text: Whether you prefer classic or creative shapes, Lany Space has something to enhance your space.
What Materials Are Our Artistic Rugs Made From?

Lany Space's artistic rugs are crafted from soft, durable polyester with a low-pile design. Stain-resistant and easy to clean, they prevent pet hair and dirt from getting trapped, keeping your rug fresh and vibrant. Perfect for busy households or as a stylish accent, our rugs blend functionality with artistry.

settings.html_content:
• Colors stay vibrant through multiple washes.
  • Backing remains secure and non-slip.
  • Pattern definition stays crisp.
  • Size remains consistent

settings.text: You can enjoy your Lany Space rug without worrying about its appearance or functionality after washing.
How do Lany Space rugs handle pet shedding?
Lany Space rugs are designed with pet owners in mind, focusing on material choice and texture to effectively handle shedding. Made from polyester, these rugs offer several advantages:

settings.html_content:
-- Resistant to Hair

Polyester's smooth surface prevents pet hair from becoming deeply embedded in the fibers, making it easier to remove with regular vacuuming or a lint roller.

+ Low-Pile Options

If Lany Space offers low-pile polyester rugs, they can be particularly effective, as hair won't get trapped as easily compared to high-pile or shag rugs.

+ Easy Maintenance

Polyester rugs are generally easy to clean. Regular vacuuming helps manage shedding, and most polyester rugs respond well to spot cleaning.

settings.text:
In addition to these features, color and pattern also play a role. Lany Space rugs are beautifully created with colorful and vivid designs, allowing pet owners to choose options that may help camouflage shedding until it's time for a deeper clean. 

Overall, Lany Space's polyester rugs are a practical choice for pet owners, combining durability and easy maintenance to manage pet shedding effectively.

settings.custom_liquid:
<style>

    .accordion {
      border-radius: 5px;
    }
    .accordion-item:last-child {
      border-bottom: none;
    }

    .accordion-header {
      cursor: pointer;
      display: flex;
      justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .accordion-header .icon {
      font-size: 20px;
      margin-right: 10px;
      letter-spacing: -2px;

    }

    .accordion-header h3 {
      margin: 0;
      font-size: 16px;
      display: flex;
       align-items: center;
    }

    .accordion-content {
      padding: 0 20px;
      max-height: 0;
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .accordion-item.active .accordion-content {
      max-height: 1000px;
    }

</style>
<script>
    const accordionContainers = document.querySelectorAll('.accordion');

    accordionContainers.forEach(container => {
      const accordionItems = container.querySelectorAll('.accordion-item');

      accordionItems.forEach(item => {
        const header = item.querySelector('.accordion-header');
        const icon = header.querySelector('.icon');

        header.addEventListener('click', () => {
          // Close all other accordion items in the same container
          accordionItems.forEach(otherItem => {
            otherItem.classList.remove('active');
            otherItem.querySelector('.icon').textContent = '+';
          });

          // Toggle the current accordion item
          item.classList.toggle('active');
          if (item.classList.contains('active')) {
            icon.textContent = '--';
          } else {
            icon.textContent = '+';
          }
        });
      });
    });

</script>
